typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Vorname as string,
		Nachname as string,
		Geburtsdatum as string,
		PLZ as string,
		Ort as string,
		Adresse as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(Geburtsdatum < "03/10/1989") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Vorname as string,
		Nachname as string,
		Geburtsdatum as string,
		PLZ as string,
		Ort as string,
		Adresse as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
